title: Salver, one of a pair
description: salver, pair of; lobed circular tray on three claw and ball feet; rim molded and chased with gadroon ornament; center engraved with a monogram consisting of the letters <JGVR> below a flaming urn crest standing for John and Cornelius Glen Van Rensselaer, in whose family they were until 1932
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
